List.ListItem: Needed to bring up a page: nsIWebBrowser - Access to content, registration of listeners. nsIWebNavigation - Navigation control. nsIBaseWindow - Embedded window management.

Other functionality: nsIWebBrowserPersist - Save As... nsIWebBrowserPrint - Printing of content. nsIWebBrowserFocus - Keyboard and window focus management. nsIWebBrowserFind - Finding in content. Session history interfaces - still in development.
